com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections

Class SectionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.SectionTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule

    public class SectionTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements PEModule
    Represents the section table of a PE.

    Is constructed by the PELoader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ENTRY_SIZE
      Size of one entry is 40

      • SectionTable

        public SectionTable(byte[] sectionTableBytes,
            int numberOfEntries,
            long offset)
        creates the SectionTable with the bytes of the table and the number of entries TODO create newInstance method
        Parameters:
        sectionTableBytes - the bytes that make up the section table
        numberOfEntries - the number of section headers in the table
        offset - the file offset to the section table

      • getSectionHeaders

        public java.util.List<SectionHeader> getSectionHeaders()
        or too small for the given file Returns all entries of the section table as a list. They are in the same order as they are within the Section Table.
        Returns:
        ordered section table entries

      • getSectionHeader

        public SectionHeader getSectionHeader(int number)
        Returns the section entry that has the given number or null if there is no section with that number.
        Parameters:
        number - of the section
        Returns:
        the section table entry that has the given number

      • getSectionHeader

        public SectionHeader getSectionHeader(java.lang.String sectionName)
        Returns the section entry that has the given name. If there are several sections with the same name, the first one will be returned. TODO there might be several sections with the same name. Provide a better way to fetch them.
        Parameters:
        sectionName - name of the section
        Returns:
        the section table entry that has the given sectionName
